description: IntroductionThe Anker Uspeed USB 3.0 front panel can be installed into a 3.5 bay of your computer easily. It expands two USB 3.0 ports which are also downwards compatible with USB 2.0 and USB 1.1. You can connect different USB devices like Docking Station, Card Reader, external enclosure etc.System RequirementsWindows XP / Vista / 7 / 8Package includes1 USB 3.0 panel (The adapter cable is approximately 2 feet long )NoteFor using the USB 3.0 port, an external USB 3.0 port at the main board or a USB 3.0 PCI-X extension card is required.This drive only has screw holes on the side. If your case only has the screw holes for the bottom of the drive, this drive will not be screwed in.About Anker UspeedThe Anker Uspeed line produces reliable computer peripherals with the latest technology standards. Using quality materials, Anker Uspeed products offer superior data transmission, power consumption, and compatibility - all at affordable prices with our great Anker customer service.
title: Anker® Uspeed USB 3.0 3.5 inch Front Panel with 2 USB 3.0 Ports Hub [20 Pin Connector & 2ft Adapter Cable]
